item.title: About me
item.description: Hi, I’m Abderrahmen Dhif, my freinds call me Abde. I’am from Tunisia where I graduated from my engineer’s degree in statistcs at Carthage university in 2015, then I moved to France and I gratuated from my master’s degree in big data and machine learning at Reims university in 2016. After 6 years of studying, I started my first job in Paris as a Data scientist/analyst in retail industry. Specially, in marketing and customer insights division.
